Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Anim'e \A"ni*m['e]`\, a. [F., animated.] (Her.) Of a different tincture from the animal itself; -- said of the eyes of a rapacious animal. --Brande & C. [1913 Webster] ||

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Anim'e \A"ni*m['e]\, n. [F. anim['e] animated (from the insects that are entrapped in it); or native name.] A resin exuding from a tropical American tree ({Hymen[ae]a courbaril}), and much used by varnish makers. --Ure. [1913 Webster]
anime n 1: a hard copal derived from an African tree [syn: {Zanzibar copal}] 2: any of various resins or oleoresins [syn: {gum anime}]
